text: Frank Mercer (born 1928), is a male former diver who competed for England. ==Diving career== He represented England in the 3 metres springboard at the 1954 British Empire and Commonwealth Games in Vancouver, Canada. ==Personal life== He opened a dance school called the Bickley School of Dance, in St Augustines Avenue, Bickley in 1975 and the school has produced some of the world's leading ballroom dancers. ==References== Category:1928 births Category:English male divers Category:Possibly living people
title: Frank Mercer (diver)
